name: NSMutableParagraphStyle
desc: An object for changing the values of the subattributes in a paragraph style attribute.

items.name: func setParagraphStyle(NSParagraphStyle)
items.desc: Replaces the subattributes of the paragraph with those in the specified paragraph style object.

items.name: var alignment: NSTextAlignment
items.desc: The text alignment of the paragraph.

items.name: var firstLineHeadIndent: CGFloat
items.desc: The indentation of the first line of the paragraph.

items.name: var headIndent: CGFloat
items.desc: The indentation of the paragraph’s lines other than the first.

items.name: var tailIndent: CGFloat
items.desc: The trailing indentation of the paragraph.

items.name: var lineHeightMultiple: CGFloat
items.desc: The line height multiple.

items.name: var maximumLineHeight: CGFloat
items.desc: The paragraph’s maximum line height.

items.name: var minimumLineHeight: CGFloat
items.desc: The paragraph’s minimum line height.

items.name: var lineSpacing: CGFloat
items.desc: The distance in points between the bottom of one line fragment and the top of the next.

items.name: var paragraphSpacing: CGFloat
items.desc: The space after the end of the paragraph.

items.name: var paragraphSpacingBefore: CGFloat
items.desc: The distance between the paragraph’s top and the beginning of its text content.

items.name: var baseWritingDirection: NSWritingDirection
items.desc: The base writing direction for the paragraph.

items.name: func addTabStop(NSTextTab)
items.desc: Adds the specified tab stop to the paragraph.

items.name: func removeTabStop(NSTextTab)
items.desc: Removes the first text tab with a location and type equal to the specified tab stop.

items.name: var tabStops: [NSTextTab]!
items.desc: The text tab objects that represent the paragraph’s tab stops.

items.name: var defaultTabInterval: CGFloat
items.desc: A number used as the document’s default tab spacing.

items.name: var textBlocks: [NSTextBlock]
items.desc: The text blocks that contain the paragraph.

items.name: var textLists: [NSTextList]
items.desc: The text lists that contain the paragraph.

items.name: var lineBreakMode: NSLineBreakMode
items.desc: The mode for breaking lines in the paragraph.

items.name: var lineBreakStrategy: NSParagraphStyle.LineBreakStrategy
items.desc: The strategies that the text system may use to break lines while laying out the paragraph.

items.name: var hyphenationFactor: Float
items.desc: The paragraph’s threshold for hyphenation.

items.name: var tighteningFactorForTruncation: Float
items.desc: The threshold for using tightening as an alternative to truncation.

items.name: var allowsDefaultTighteningForTruncation: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the system tightens intercharacter spacing before truncating text.

items.name: var headerLevel: Int
items.desc: The paragraph’s header level for HTML generation.
